channel.title: Lulzsec declares war on the US
channel.description:
[url]https://pastebin.com/9KyA0E5v[/url]
I know there has been a lot of discussion in this section about lulzsec, and I keep thinking they'll get old, but their actions never cease to amaze me. They have teamed up with Anonymous and are commanding all of their Twitter followers to compromise as much classified government stuff as possible; documents, emails and passwords, bank info, anything. I'd consider this a definite act of treason if not outright war.

item.title: Lulzsec declares war on the US
item.dc:creator: mankyman6
item.description:
GTXChrome:

All they had were a bunch of pre-coded tools. Did you honestly think this would lead to something major?

I had more important things to do than to research a group of morons. So I was not aware of the tools at their disposal. Good day, sir.

Read full topic
item.source: Lulzsec declares war on the US

mankyman6:

Looks like the war didn’t last long. And here I was hoping for something big to happen.

All they had were a bunch of pre-coded tools. Did you honestly think this would lead to something major?

item.title: Lulzsec declares war on the US
item.dc:creator: Shinobi
item.description:
Zeus:

Hehe, Gargantuae.
On topic: I really want to see how mad all the different intelligence and investigation/law enforcement organizations around the world get. I want to see how they deal with these guys as well.
The funny part is their whole “AntiSec” operation will increase internet tyranny, not decrease it.

EDIT: Also, this thread radiates political incompetency.

I don’t think governments will react visibly. At least the FBI won’t. I mean if they haven’t yet they aren’t going to. They will just deal with it quietly.

Read full topic
item.source: Lulzsec declares war on the US

THISSSS THIS THREAD IS POINTLESS AND EVERYONE IN IT EXCEPT ME CUZ IM JUST AWESOME.

Ok? I win.

/thread

Hehe, Gargantuae.
On topic: I really want to see how mad all the different intelligence and investigation/law enforcement organizations around the world get. I want to see how they deal with these guys as well.
The funny part is their whole “AntiSec” operation will increase internet tyranny, not decrease it.

EDIT: Also, this thread radiates political incompetency.

item.title: Lulzsec declares war on the US
item.dc:creator: Generalismo_Benzino
item.description:
Termo543:

A good thing, huh? Are YOU a fucking moron? Think about the consequences of that you dumbfuck! It would be a damn ball for the arms dealers! IF a regular citizen couldn’t own a gun then they have nothing to defend in case of a gang or robbers or some other shit.
All the complete fucking assholes would have guns! Murder rates would rise. As well as crime in general. If Obama ever revoked the 2nd ammendment it would spell out hell for this country in more than one way.Its simple. The people with guns would overrun the people without guns. The police wouldn’t be able to do much and the military would only make problems worse! Guns offer a sense and means of rotection, security, and control. The regular citizens wouldn’t want to get in trouble while the criminals wouldn’t give a damn. This whole post is completely disorganized!

Tell ya what. Anyone who wants my guns can have them…one fucking bullet at a time.

dude. there are several countries without guns. instead they use knives. I really don’t see a problem with banning guns. The weapons will just change but knives are less effective than guns.

your reasoning is flawed. and I’m lazy. goodbye.

Read full topic

geekofalltrades:

…this is what governments are for. Do you think you’d be happier without a government? Because I don’t think you would be.

No, We all need a government. But this doesn’t mean that governments are good people.

In other hand, Sometime discussing about politics make other problems. Maybe the only way to grow a country is letting governments do what they want. Exactly what china people do now. Dont ask. No criticism.

item.description:
Obama isn’t perfect, but he’s doing his job of dragging this country that Bush and Clinton lead downhill back uphill.

:lol:
Well, okay, I’ll give it to you. He did scrap F-22, after all. My niggah!
If he scraps M1 and buys a Leopard while he still can - he may as well have a chance to be written down in the history books as a true savior.

garrthbarrttinn:

How about we just take all the filthy rich people’s money and we’ll have the debt fixed in a day?

No, boob, you’ll have to cope with a default, one way or another. God bless you.

item.title: Lulzsec declares war on the US
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
BrAndi:

I spoke to a think-tank analyst the other day

There was your first problem.

BrAndi:

Now just because he makes a 5 figure salary each month it doesn’t mean he’s right.

Correct.

BrAndi:

But it is funny how lulsec is targeting the entertainment sector and governments instead for example the military industrial complex or banks.

Not true or funny. They’ve gone after Lockheed Martin and a bunch of other military contractors AND several banks. Your “think tank” buddy needs to lay off the crazy sauce.

Read full topic
item.source: Lulzsec declares war on the US

item.title: Lulzsec declares war on the US
item.dc:creator: BrAndi
item.description:
I spoke to a think-tank analyst the other day who basically assumes that lulsec might be another bogus enemy doing the false flag thingy and enabling the governments to pass laws like IP protect (if you don’t know what that is about google it as long as you are still able to) under the pretense of internet terrorist attacks.

Now just because he makes a 5 figure salary each month it doesn’t mean he’s right. But it is funny how lulsec is targeting the entertainment sector and governments instead for example the military industrial complex or banks.

Read full topic
